title: SFG pool liquidity rewards  on Uniswap
body:
As the SFG liquidity reward for the Balancer pool has been cancelled, community members call for the need to establish an SFG/UU pool in Uniswap as soon as possible and provide SFG as a liquidity reward. The SFG reward weight needs to be confirmed with community members before the establishment.

The following options are currently given:
1. The SFG pool liquidity reward weight on Uniswap is 30%
2. The SFG pool liquidity reward weight on Uniswap is 30%
3. The SFG pool liquidity reward weight on Uniswap is 30%

### The voting time
 2021.2.10 00:00-2021.2.10 23:59 SGT

> The core developers of the community will complete the creation of the SFG/UU liquidity pool on Uniswap within 24 hours after the voting on the proposal ends.
---
由于目前已经取消了Balancer 池的 SFG 流动性奖励，社区成员呼吁需要尽快在 Uniswap 建立 SFG/UU 池并提供 SFG 作为流动性奖励，在建立之前需要与社区成员确认 SFG 奖励权重。

目前给出以下三种选择：
1.  Uniswap 上 SFG  池流动性奖励为 30%
2.  Uniswap 上 SFG  池流动性奖励为 40%
3.  Uniswap 上 SFG  池流动性奖励为 50%

## 投票时间
2021.2.10 00:00 - 2021.2.10 23:59 SGT

> 社区核心开发者将在提案投票结束后 24 小时内完成 Uniswap 上 SFG/UU 流动性池创建。
author: 0x0DdD732AC31D2a4A51552e707FB0DcB0F65062f4
